name: RochesterMNWinterParking
0:
”Alexa, ask our streets if I can park”
”Alexa, ask our streets if I can park on the even side”
”Alexa, ask our streets if I can park overnight on November twenty sixth”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: our streets
des:
This skill will let you know whether you are allowed to park on the even or odd side of a street in Rochester, MN when the winter rules are in effect. You can set your side of the street so that Alexa remembers whether you live on the even or odd side of the street.

You can set your location by saying things like:
"Tell our streets that I usually park on the even side."
"Tell our streets that my address is 1234."

The skill only remembers whether the location is even or odd.

You can clear your location by saying things like:
"Tell our streets to remove location."
"Tell our streets to remove parking setting."

You can ask questions like:
"Ask our streets if I can park on the odd side."
"Ask our streets if I can park overnight on November 26."
"Ask our streets what are the rules?"

If you have not set your location, you need to specify the even or odd side of the street.

Hopefully, you will find this skill helpful, but you are responsible for any and all consequences of when or where you park your vehicle.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
